President Kaiser:



Kaiser shook his head after Suka had left.  "Pitiful creature." he laughed, 
activating a comm. unit directly to the bridge of the large craft.  "This is 
President Kaiser.  Captain Nemo, I want you to stop and orbit Earth when we 
arrive.  I want time to be fully prepared."

"Understood, Mr. President," the feathery humanoid replied over the comm.
